H0.text: What plant, named Olea europaea, is an ancient widely used metaphor for peace. Laurel

H1.text: What plant, named Olea europaea, is an ancient widely used metaphor for peace. Myrtle

H2.text: What plant, named Olea europaea, is an ancient widely used metaphor for peace. Cypress

H3.text: What plant, named Olea europaea, is an ancient widely used metaphor for peace. Olive

A4.text: Ancient Greeks regarded the olive tree as sacred and a symbol of peace, prosperity, and wisdomâ€”associations that have persisted.
